issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
When the osg and walrus are deployed on the same host errors from walrus are not correctly handled. 

One way to see errors is to create and delete a bucket:

{code}
2017-01-20 14:20:47  WARN | Got error during bucket cleanup. Will retry
com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.exceptions.s3.InternalErrorException: We encountered an internal error. Please try again.
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.providers.walrus.WalrusProviderClient.mapWalrusExceptionToS3Exception(WalrusProviderClient.java:296)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.providers.walrus.WalrusProviderClient.deleteBucket(WalrusProviderClient.java:403)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.BucketFactoryImpl$1.apply(BucketFactoryImpl.java:159)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.BucketFactoryImpl$1.apply(BucketFactoryImpl.java:153)
	at com.google.common.base.Functions$PredicateFunction.apply(Functions.java:258)
	at com.google.common.base.Functions$PredicateFunction.apply(Functions.java:249)
	at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$TransactionalFunction.apply(Entities.java:1550)
	at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$4.apply(Entities.java:1634)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.BucketFactoryImpl.deleteBucket(BucketFactoryImpl.java:180)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.asynctask.BucketReaperTask.resolveBucketState(BucketReaperTask.java:114)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.asynctask.BucketReaperTask.run(BucketReaperTask.java:76)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.jobs.MainBucketReaperJob.execute(MainBucketReaperJob.java:87)
	at org.quartz.core.JobRunShell.run(JobRunShell.java:213)
	at org.quartz.simpl.SimpleThreadPool$WorkerThread.run(SimpleThreadPool.java:557)
Caused by: com.eucalyptus.util.EucalyptusCloudException: com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message DeleteBucketType to service walrusbackend-request because: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.walrus.exceptions.NoSuchBucketException: NoSuchBucket
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.providers.walrus.WalrusProviderClient.proxyRequest(WalrusProviderClient.java:282)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.providers.walrus.WalrusProviderClient.deleteBucket(WalrusProviderClient.java:400)
	... 12 more
Caused by: java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message DeleteBucketType to service walrusbackend-request because: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.walrus.exceptions.NoSuchBucketException: NoSuchBucket
	at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.reportGet(CompletableFuture.java:357)
	at java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.get(CompletableFuture.java:1895)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests.sendSync(AsyncRequests.java:127)
	at com.eucalyptus.util.async.AsyncRequests.sendSync(AsyncRequests.java:108)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.providers.walrus.WalrusProviderClient$WalrusClient.sendSyncA(WalrusProviderClient.java:179)
	at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.providers.walrus.WalrusProviderClient.proxyRequest(WalrusProviderClient.java:264)
	... 13 more
Caused by: com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceDispatchException: Failed to send message DeleteBucketType to service walrusbackend-request because: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.walrus.exceptions.NoSuchBucketException: NoSuchBucket
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.lambda$send$1(ServiceContext.java:259)
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.lambda$runWithContext$2(ServiceContext.java:292)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142)
	at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)
Caused by: org.springframework.messaging.MessageHandlingException: nested exception is com.eucalyptus.walrus.exceptions.NoSuchBucketException: NoSuchBucket
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.processMessage(MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.java:96)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.ServiceActivatingHandler.handleRequestMessage(ServiceActivatingHandler.java:89)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.handleMessageInternal(AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.java:109)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractMessageHandler.handleMessage(AbstractMessageHandler.java:127)
	at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.AbstractDispatcher.tryOptimizedDispatch(AbstractDispatcher.java:116)
	at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.doDispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:148)
	at org.springframework.integration.dispatcher.UnicastingDispatcher.dispatch(UnicastingDispatcher.java:121)
	at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractSubscribableChannel.doSend(AbstractSubscribableChannel.java:77)
	at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:423)
	at org.springframework.integration.channel.AbstractMessageChannel.send(AbstractMessageChannel.java:373)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSend(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:115)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSendAndReceive(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:150)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.GenericMessagingTemplate.doSendAndReceive(GenericMessagingTemplate.java:45)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractMessagingTemplate.sendAndReceive(AbstractMessagingTemplate.java:42)
	at org.springframework.messaging.core.AbstractDestinationResolvingMessagingTemplate.sendAndReceive(AbstractDestinationResolvingMessagingTemplate.java:112)
	at com.eucalyptus.context.ServiceContext.lambda$send$1(ServiceContext.java:254)
	... 4 more
{code}

The error propagation in WalrusProviderClient#proxyRequest needs updating or we need to ensure the expected ServiceDispatchException is thrown as expected. This error handling behaviour may have changed due to mule removal in 4.4.
fields.summary: Object storage not handling walrus errors when deployed on same host

comments.body: To verify, check for errors after qa runs when walrus and ufs are on the same host.

[~sjones], checking on QA runs (with walrus and OSG on same host) I still see errors thrown, however they are for different reason not related to the OSG service. Are these type expected to be handled by this change as well?

ex.
{code}
2017-01-30 10:55:17  WARN | Got error during bucket cleanup. Will retry
com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.exceptions.s3.BucketNotEmptyException: BucketNotEmpty
	at com.eucalyptus.walrus.WalrusFSManager.deleteBucket(WalrusFSManager.java:345)

	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)
	at org.springframework.expression.spel.support.ReflectiveMethodExecutor.execute(ReflectiveMethodExecutor.java:113)

	at org.springframework.integration.handler.MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.processMessage(MethodInvokingMessageProcessor.java:93)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.ServiceActivatingHandler.handleRequestMessage(ServiceActivatingHandler.java:89)
	at org.springframework.integration.handler.AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.handleMessageInternal(AbstractReplyProducingMessageHandler.java:109)

Observed with the following packages installed:
Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.4.0
Release     : 0.25773.140.20170128gitc9a422a.el7
[~tony], this fix does not address that error which is not related to to the general error handling fix.

Fix Verified

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.4.0
Release     : 0.25773.140.20170128gitc9a422a.el7

The general error handling fix has shown to be effective in CI.
Moving 4.4.0 Issues from Release Pending to Resolved
